name: v0.7.1
body:
Changes since previous release:

- `gftools builder`
  - Set axisOrder to default fvar order if not specified https://github.com/googlefonts/gftools/pull/351
  - Do not interpret styleName if one has been provided https://github.com/googlefonts/gftools/pull/359
  - Fix opsz elided values https://github.com/googlefonts/gftools/pull/360

- `gftools packager`
  - Fix typos https://github.com/googlefonts/gftools/pull/357, https://github.com/googlefonts/gftools/pull/358

name: v0.7.0
body:
Changes since previous previous release:

- Rename master branch to main
- Fix broken urls in docs https://github.com/googlefonts/gftools/commit/3ed6aa00cfef45a776efc619d84aeca66d22f6ee
- `gftools gen-html` added documentation https://github.com/googlefonts/gftools/pull/323
- Updated Axis Registry https://github.com/googlefonts/gftools/pull/336
- `gftools builder`
  - Fix cleanUp https://github.com/googlefonts/gftools/pull/327
  - Added flatten components arg https://github.com/googlefonts/gftools/pull/327
  - Updated fvar instance psnames https://github.com/googlefonts/gftools/pull/329
  - Added `buildOTF`, `buildTTF` config params https://github.com/googlefonts/gftools/pull/330
  - Added `statics` config param which will instantiate static fonts https://github.com/googlefonts/gftools/pull/309
  - Fix VF filenames https://github.com/googlefonts/gftools/pull/341

name: v0.6.2
body:
Changes since previous release:

- Updated requirements.txt #289
- `gftools builder` added --dump config option and improved readme #292
- `gftools gen-html` allow users to test their own templates #294
- `gftools builder` added `includeSourceFixes` arg in configs #296
- `gftools builder` conditionally import freetype since it is not supported in Big Sur yet #298
- `gftools gen-html` work on Python versions < v3.8 #313
- `gftools builder` fix getting family name from src files #315

name: v0.6.1
body:
Changes since previous release:

- `gftools push-status`: Refactored and add --lint arg #284
- `gftools qa`: Refactored posting qa results back to github prs #286

name: v0.6.0
body:
Changes since previous release:

- Added `gftools builder` #278
- Added `gftool gen-html` #280
- STAT tables can now be defined in a yaml file and used in `gftools gen-stat` #282
- Fixed logging issues #277
- Refactor `gftools.fix` module #276

name: v0.5.2

body:

name: v0.5.0
body:
Changes since previous release:
- Added fix module
- Refactored key fix scripts
- Added `gftools fix-font` and `gftools fix-family`
- Added GH Action to build and push releases to PyPI
